metadata.title: USS Wasp LHD-1 Ships Ball Cap
features: Officially Licensed Vendor of U.S. Army, Navy, Marine Corps, and Air Force (Beware of Unlicensed Sellers)
Proceeds support Morale Wellness & Recreation (MWR) programs of the U.S. Military
Personalize with text on back of cap (All Capital Letters)
description: MilitaryBest is proud to offer this USS Wasp LHD-1 Ships Ball Cap. Each of our “Made in the USA” Military caps are a full wrap (no mesh back) poly nylon with adjustable snap back. Each has a ventilation hole above the strap. Our Military caps are of the same variety sold in Posts and Exchanges around the globe. MilitaryBest has been selling these high quality caps for over 18 years and the quality of each is guaranteed! All of our Military Caps are licensed through the different branches of service. A percentage of the sale of each cap is forwarded to the Morale; Wellness; & Recreation programs of each respective branch of the United States Military.

For caps with custom text on the back; the text will be embroidered in ALL CAPS in an arch over the closure opening and not in a straight line as shown in the customization preview. Caps with custom back text are non-returnable unless there is a defect in the material or workmanship.
